org.gridlab.gat.io.cpi
Class EndpointCpi

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.gridlab.gat.io.cpi.EndpointCpi
All Implemented Interfaces:
Advertisable, Endpoint, Monitorable, Serializable
public abstract class EndpointCpi
extends Object
implements Endpoint

Capability provider interface to the Endpoint class.

Capability provider wishing to provide the functionality of the Endoint class must extend this class and implement all of the abstract methods in this class. Each abstract method in this class mirrors the corresponding method in this EndPoint class and will be used to implement the corresponding method in the EndPoint class at runtime.

See Also:

connect

public Pipe connect()
             throws GATInvocationException
Description copied from interface: Endpoint
Connect to the Endpoint. When a GATEndpoint is obtained from an Advert Directory, it can be used to create a Pipe connected to the advertising application, by calling connect on the Endpoint instance.

Specified by:
connect in interface Endpoint
Returns:
a new Pipe connected to the Endpoint.
Throws:
GATInvocationException - if no connection could be made.

listen

public Pipe listen()
            throws GATInvocationException
Description copied from interface: Endpoint
Listen for a new connection to the Endpoint. The creator of an Endpoint can use the Endpoint to create Pipes, which represent incoming connections. This is done by calling listen on the Endpoint instance. This call is synchronous, and blocks until a connection has been made.

Specified by:
listen in interface Endpoint
Returns:
a new Pipe connected to the Endpoint.
Throws:
GATInvocationException - if no connection could be made.

listen

public void listen(PipeListener pipeListener)
            throws GATInvocationException
Description copied from interface: Endpoint
Listen for a new connection to the Endpoint. The creator of an Endpoint can use the Endpoint to create Pipes, which represent incoming connections. This is done by calling listen on the Endpoint instance. This call is asynchronous, and returns immediately. When a new connection has been made, the pipeListener will be informed.

Specified by:
listen in interface Endpoint
Throws:
GATInvocationException - if no connection could be made.

addMetricListener

public void addMetricListener(MetricListener metricListener,
                              Metric metric)
                       throws RemoteException
Description copied from interface: Monitorable
This method adds the passed instance of a MetricListener to the list of MetricListeners which are notified of MetricEvents by an instance of this class. The passed MetricListener is only notified of MetricEvents which correspond to Metric instance passed to this method.

Specified by:
addMetricListener in interface Monitorable
Parameters:
metricListener - The MetricListener to notify of MetricEvents
metric - The Metric corresponding to the MetricEvents for which the passed MetricListener will be notified
Throws:
RemoteException - Thrown upon problems accessing the remote instance

getMetrics

public List getMetrics()
                throws RemoteException
Description copied from interface: Monitorable
This method returns a java.util.List of Metric instances. Each Metric instance in this java.util.List is a Metric which can be monitored on this instance.

Specified by:
getMetrics in interface Monitorable
Returns:
An java.util.List of Metric instances. Each Metric instance in this java.util.List is a Metric which can be monitored on this instance
Throws:
RemoteException - Thrown upon problems accessing the remote instance
